caption: A gentle breeze sweeps through a quaint, snow-covered street, causing the snowflakes to dance and swirl under the warm glow of streetlights. The soft illumination highlights the intricate architecture of the surrounding buildings, their windows reflecting the festive lights strung along the eaves. The scene is serene, with the quiet rustle of the wind and the occasional crunch of snow underfoot as a few late-night pedestrians make their way home, their silhouettes briefly visible against the softly falling snow.
